parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the currently selected system of units.
* 0: Metric
* 1: Mixed (ground vehicles use Metric / air vehicles use Imperial)
* 2: Imperial

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''systemOfUnits'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_system = '''systemOfUnits''';</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[BIS_fnc_convertUnits]] [[setSystemOfUnits]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
